person.persName: Benjamin C Allin (circuit clerk, mercer county)

body.p: Born in Kentucky in 1808, Ben C Allen was the circuit clerk for Mercer county. Owned two slaves in 1860.

Spouse: Susan H. Allen (Warren)
Children: Kate Allen, Phillip T Allen, Bushrod W Allen, William B Allen, Susan J Allen, Grant Allen, Mary D Allen, Thomas Allen
